Issue.creator: alacambra
Issue.summary: method getStateByPartialCompositeKey do not return anything
Issue.description: getStateByPartialCompositeKey(String compositeKey) is not working properly. On commit 9f2f4f9843d669e74adec11ccd80773fefe10e86 has been added a key validation. This validation does not allow to put the characters that the CompositeKeys needs to get its entries. My solution would be to remove the validation on this point and set into the method getStateByPartialCompositeKey(String key). Then it would create the compositeKey correctly and call the getStateByRangeMethod. I would also suggest the creation of a method getStateByPartialCompositeKey(CompositeKey key). In my opinion It looks the correct way to work. >
